title: popup.css
content: #contact { background: #fff; width: 580px; } #contact .contact-headline { width: 95.8%; padding: 2.5% 0 2% 4.2%; background: #f7f7f7; float: left; clear: left; } #contact .contact-headline h1 { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Regu',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 34px; color: #739324; } #contact .contact-headline h2 { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Regu',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: #000; width: 90%; } #contact #contact-form { width: 100%; padding-top: 4%; float: left; clear: left; } #contact #contact-form .fields {padding: 0 4.2%} #contact .width {width: 97%} #contact .field { height: 70px; width: 45%; margin-right: 4.9%; float: left; } #contact .field.full {width: 99%} #contact .field.right {margin: 0 0 0 4.9%} #contact #contact-form label { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #3e3d40; white-space: nowrap; margin-bottom: 5px; float: left; clear: left; } #contact #contact-form input.text { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 23px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; } #contact #contact-form input.text,#contact-form textarea { padding: 5px 5px; background: #f6f6f6; border: 1px solid #ddd; float: left; clear: left; -webkit-appearance: none; } #contact #contact-form textarea { width: 97%; height: 80px; margin-bottom: 15px; resize: vertical; } #contact textarea::-webkit-input-placeholder {font-style: italic} #contact textarea:-moz-placeholder {font-style: italic} #contact textarea:-ms-input-placeholder {font-style: italic} #contact .submit { width: 100%; background: #f7f7f7; padding: 6px 0 80px 0; float: left; clear: left; } p.mandatory { margin: 0 0 19px 4.2%; float: left; } #contact .submit input { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #3e3d40; border: 1px solid #ddd; background: #fdfdfd url(../images/submit.gif) repeat-x left bottom; -webkit-border-radius: 4px; -moz-border-radius: 4px; border-radius: 4px; padding: 5px 9px; float: right; margin-right: 4.7%; cursor: pointer; } #contact #contact-form select { width: 103.2%; padding: 5px 0; float: left; clear: left; } a.menu-back {display: none} #thank-you-content { margin-top: 4%; margin-left: 4.2%; padding-right: 4.2%; float: left; } @media only screen and (max-width: 320px) { #contact #contact-form .column {width: 100%} #contact #contact-form .column.left, #contact #contact-form .column.right {margin: 0} #contact #contact-form {padding-top: 4%} #contact #contact-form .field.extra-long {height: 85px} #contact #contact-form .field.extra-long label {white-space: normal} #contact #contact-form .field {width: 100%;margin: 0} .field.space {display: none} } @media screen and (min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 556px) { #contact {width: auto} a.menu-back { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #3e3d40; padding: 5.3% 9% 4.8% 4.2%; margin-bottom: 1px; height: 20px; position: relative !important; background: #f1f1f1; display: block; } #contact #contact-form select {height: 31px} #contact #contact-form input.text,#contact-form textarea { width: 99%; font-size: 13px; padding: 7px 5px; } #contact-form textarea {width: 96% !important} #contact .submit { background: transparent; padding: 6px 0 30px 0; } #contact .submit input { width: 91.6%; height: 40px; margin: 0 4.2%; } }
